dxflib Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
DL_CreationInterfaceAbstract class (interface) for the creation of new entities
DL_DxfReads the given DXF file
DL_ExceptionBrief class description
DL_WriterDefines interface for writing low level DXF constructs to a file; implementation is defined in derived classes that write to binary or ASCII files.
Implements functions that write higher level constructs in terms of the low level ones
DL_WriterAImplements functions defined in DL_Writer for writing low level DXF constructs to an ASCII format DXF file
